verses.verse: Righteous <WH6662> art thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah, when I contend <WH7378> with thee <WH1696>; yet would I reason the cause <WH4941> with thee <WH1870>: wherefore doth the way of the wicked <WH7563> prosper <WH6743>? wherefore are all they at ease <WH7951> that deal very <WH899> treacherously <WH898>?

Thou hast planted <WH5193> them <WH8327>, yea, they have taken root; they grow <WH3212>, yea <WH6213>, they bring forth fruit <WH6529>: thou art near <WH7138> in their mouth <WH6310>, and far from <WH7350> their heart <WH3629>.

But thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah, knowest <WH3045> me <WH7200>; thou seest me <WH974>, and triest my heart <WH3820> toward thee <WH5423>: pull them out like sheep <WH6629> for the slaughter <WH2878>, and prepare <WH6942> them for the day <WH3117> of slaughter <WH2028>.

How long shall the land <WH776> mourn <WH56>, and the herbs <WH6212> of the whole country <WH7704> wither <WH3001>? for the wickedness <WH7451> of them that dwell <WH3427> therein <WH929>, the beasts are consumed <WH5595>, and the birds <WH5775>; because they said <WH559>, He shall not see <WH7200> our latter end <WH319>.

If thou hast run <WH7323> with the footmen <WH7273>, and they have wearied <WH3811> thee <WH8474>, then how canst thou contend with horses <WH5483>? and though in a land <WH776> of peace <WH7965> thou art secure <WH982>, yet how wilt thou do <WH6213> in the pride of the Jordan <WH3383>?

For even thy brethren <WH251>, and the house <WH1004> of thy father <WH1>, even they have dealt treacherously <WH898> with thee <WH7121>; even they have cried aloud <WH4392> after <WH310> thee <WH539>: believe them not <WH1696>, though they speak fair words unto thee <WH2896>.

I have forsaken <WH5800> my house <WH1004>, I have cast <WH5203> off my heritage <WH5159>; I have given <WH5414> the dearly beloved <WH3033> of my soul <WH5315> into the hand <WH3709> of her enemies <WH341>.
My heritage <WH5159> is become unto me as a lion <WH738> in the forest <WH3293>: she hath uttered <WH5414> her voice against me <WH8130>; therefore I have hated her.

Is my heritage <WH5159> unto me as a speckled <WH6641> bird <WH5861> of prey <WH5861>? are the birds of prey against her round about <WH5439>? go <WH3212> ye <WH622>, assemble all the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, bring <WH857> them to devour <WH402>.

Many <WH7227> shepherds <WH7462> have destroyed <WH7843> my vineyard <WH3754>, they have trodden <WH947> my portion <WH2513> under foot <WH947>, they have made <WH5414> my pleasant <WH2532> portion <WH2513> a desolate <WH8077> wilderness <WH4057>.

They have made <WH7760> it a desolation <WH8076>; it mourneth <WH56> unto me <WH8077>, being desolate; the whole land <WH776> is made desolate <WH8074>, because no man <WH376> layeth <WH7760> it to heart <WH3820>.

Destroyers <WH7703> are come <WH935> upon all the bare heights <WH8205> in the wilderness <WH4057>; for the sword <WH2719> of Jehovah <WH3068> devoureth <WH398> from the one end <WH7097> of the land <WH776> even to the other end <WH7097> of the land <WH776>: no flesh <WH1320> hath peace <WH7965>.

They have sown <WH2232> wheat <WH2406>, and have reaped <WH7114> thorns <WH6975>; they have put themselves to pain <WH2470>, and profit <WH3276> nothing <WH954>: and ye shall be ashamed of your fruits <WH8393>, because of the fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> against all mine evil <WH7451> neighbors <WH7934>, that touch <WH5060> the inheritance <WH5159> which I have caused my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478> to inherit <WH5157>: behold <WH5428>, I will pluck them up from off their land <WH127>, and will pluck up <WH5428> the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> from among them <WH8432>.

And it shall come to pass <WH310>, after that I have plucked them up <WH5428>, I will return <WH7725> and have compassion <WH7355> on them <WH7725>; and I will bring them again, every man <WH376> to his heritage <WH5159>, and every man <WH376> to his land <WH776>.

And it shall come to pass <WH3925>, if they will diligently learn <WH3925> the ways <WH1870> of my people <WH5971>, to swear <WH7650> by my name <WH8034>, As Jehovah <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>; even as they taught <WH3925> my people <WH5971> to swear <WH7650> by Baal <WH1168>; then shall they be built <WH1129> up in the midst <WH8432> of my people <WH5971>.
But if they will not hear <WH8085>, then will I pluck <WH5428> up <WH5428> that nation <WH1471>, plucking up <WH5428> and destroying it <WH5002>, saith Jehovah <WH3068>.
